questions.question: Rabbits can see what's behind themselves without turning their heads.
The ghosts in 'Pac-Man' and 'Ms. Pac-Man' have completely different behavior.
The first 'Metal Gear' game was released for the PlayStation 1.
Faust is a playable character in 'Guilty Gear Xrd Revelator'.
Valve's 'Portal' and 'Half-Life' franchises exist within the same in-game universe.
Time on Computers is measured via the EPOX System.
Ottawa is the capital of Canada.
Bob Ross was a US Air Force pilot.
In Heroes of the Storm, the Cursed Hollow map gimmick requires players to kill the undead to curse the enemy team.
Night on Bald Mountain was one of the musical pieces featured in Disney's 1940's film Fantasia.
